name: Warframe: 3210 Platinum + Triple Rare Mod
summary:
Purchase 3210 Platinum, an in-game currency you can spend on Warframes, weapons, consumables, sentinels, Mods, and a variety of other items from the in-game Market. It can also be used to instantly finish crafting items in the Foundry.

Triple Rare Mod includes:
- Armored Agility: Rare Mod that increases run speed and armor.
- Animal Instinct: Rare Mod that increases loot radar and enemy sense.
- Seeking Fury: Rare Mod that increase reload speed and punch through.
